tools.author: virgiiooo
tools.name: Raster Tool
tools.description: This pro-grade studio converts your images into experimental raster art using a library of unusual textures like ASCII, glitch strokes, and zebra stripes. By processing brightness data in real-time, the engine maps your photos onto customizable grids where you can manipulate density, rotation, and line weight to create high-contrast, editorial-style layouts. Whether you are using one of the 60 curated color palettes or stripping the background for a transparent PNG export, the tool is built to turn standard photography into bold, print-ready graphic design.

tools.author: virgiiooo
tools.name: Wave Brush Tool
tools.description: This interactive drawing app lets you create intricate, symmetric wave patterns with a simple stroke of your mouse. It uses a specialized "wave brush" engine to turn your movements into flowing strands of color that you can customize by adjusting their sharpness, thickness, and frequency. With built-in tools for harmonic color palettes and ultra-high-resolution exports, it provides a streamlined space for turning fluid gestures into professional digital art or print-ready designs.

tools.author: virgiiooo
tools.name: Mandala Gif Tool
tools.description: This studio transforms mathematical curves into glowing, symmetric patterns that pulse and evolve as you watch. It combines fluid motion with neon colors to create mesmerizing mandalas that you can fully customize—from the way they "breathe" to their intricate geometric shapes. Built for creators, it offers professional tools to capture high-quality video loops and high-resolution prints for instant sharing or professional design work.

tools.author: virgiiooo
tools.name: Mandala Gif Tool
tools.description: This studio transforms mathematical curves into glowing, symmetric patterns that pulse and evolve as you watch. It combines fluid motion with neon colors to create mesmerizing mandalas that you can fully customize—from the way they "breathe" to their intricate geometric shapes. tools.author: virgiiooo
tools.name: 3d Typography Tool
tools.description: This browser-based creative suite merges experimental typography with a robust 3D WEBGL environment, allowing you to wrap live text textures around spheres, cylinders, or imported custom OBJ models. By leveraging a sine-wave kinetic engine, the tool breathes life into static characters through automated pulses in scale, tracking, and geometry radius, creating mesmerizing motion graphics in real-time. Whether you are adjusting the "Chaos 360" rotation for a glitch aesthetic or fine-tuning the UV-mapping for perfect repetition, the system is designed for high-fidelity output, offering transparent PNG exports and seamless looping GIF recording for professional design workflows.

tools.author: virgiiooo

By leveraging a sine-wave kinetic engine, the tool breathes life into static characters through automated pulses in scale, tracking, and geometry radius, creating mesmerizing motion graphics in real-time. Whether you are adjusting the "Chaos 360" rotation for a glitch aesthetic or fine-tuning the UV-mapping for perfect repetition, the system is designed for high-fidelity output, offering transparent PNG exports and seamless looping GIF recording for professional design workflows.

tools.description: This machine is a creative transformation of a classic sewing machine. Instead of sewing fabric with a needle and thread, it has been rebuilt to produce fresh pasta. The original mechanical body now houses professional rollers that press and cut dough into perfect noodles.

tools.author: carmen anthea
tools.name: LOOPA PRO MAX
tools.description: LOOPA PRO enables users to draw, edit, and animate frame-by-frame sequences using a clean timeline-based workflow. Each frame is an independent canvas state, allowing precise control over motion, layering, and pacing. Animations can be previewed in real time and exported as GIFs or image sequences for production use.

tools.author: carmen anthea
tools.name: FILAMENTA PRO MAX
tools.description: FILAMENTA PRO transforms mouse strokes into living filament networks. As you draw, points connect to nearby points based on distance rules, forming organic meshes, neural webs, and structural line compositions. The result is a hybrid between drawing, generative art, and procedural illustration ideal for abstract graphics, data-like visuals, and experimental layouts.

tools.author: carmen anthea
tools.name: PIXELA PRO MAX
tools.description: PIXELA PRO converts images into pixel-driven graphic systems dots, lines, squares, cross-hatching, and abstract marks while giving the user full control over density, color logic, repetition, and layering. It is designed for poster design, print experimentation, editorial visuals, and generative image art.

tools.author: carmen anthea
tools.name: FOVEA PRO MAX
tools.description: FOVEA PRO turns text into a living visual system. Characters are rendered line-by-line and respond to cursor movement or automated motion through a bulge-based distortion engine, creating fluid, organic typographic effects suitable for posters, motion graphics, branding experiments, and generative art.

tools.author: Bernardi_Elisa
tools.name: MEGA ARCADE DEFENDER
tools.description:
In MEGA ARCADE DEFENDER, you're the star! Upload your image directly to the spaceship and prepare to destroy waves of aliens in 3 levels inspired by the legendary Space Invaders.

Pilot a spaceship by uploading a photo of yourself (or your cat, why not?)

The game captures your best moves and instantly creates a GIF. Share it and challenge your friends.

tools.author: Bernardi_Elisa

tools.author: Bernardi_Elisa
tools.name: MEGA ARCADE DEFENDER
tools.description:
In MEGA ARCADE DEFENDER, you're the star! Upload your image directly to the spaceship and prepare to destroy waves of aliens in 3 levels inspired by the legendary Space Invaders.

Pilot a spaceship by uploading a photo of yourself (or your cat, why not?)

The game captures your best moves and instantly creates a GIF. Share it and challenge your friends.

tools.author: Bernardi_Elisa
tools.name: Find my caries!
tools.description:
My creative process began with the study of traditional industrial gears composed of smaller,complex cogwheels. I decided to subvert the cold, mechanical nature of the machine by transforming its most essential parts, that allow the gears to lock together. By replacing metal components with human teeth, the structure mutates into something more alive and organic.

I brought this surreal creation to life using p5.js, making it the protagonist of a three-level game. The gameplay focuses on an inspection of the rotating wheel to find and destroy all the cavities hidden within the teeth. By eliminating these "errors" or infections while the wheel is
in motion, the player helps the toothed gear achieve a "perfect smile."
This work explores the boundary between the artificial and the natural, turning a repetitive mechanical motion into a struggle for hygiene and perfection.

tools.author: Bernardi_Elisa
tools.name: Fibotext
tools.description:
Fibotext liberates your words, transforming static text into dynamic visual sculptures, surpassing the same old, dull linear script.

Project your typography onto spheres, cylinders, or the elegant sweep of the Fibonacci spiral, crafting breathtaking 3D layouts in seconds.

tools.author: Bernardi_Elisa
tools.name: Analogix
tools.description:
They aren't just squares; they are the raw atoms of the digital realm.

This tool redefines  unified the tactile intimacy of sketching on a Fabriano paper and the structural clarity of pixel art.

Experience a brush that breathes like graphite and flows like watercolor, yet possesses the architectural power of the pixel. 
Don’t just draw: build your vision.

tools.author: Bernardi_Elisa
tools.name: Veil
tools.description:
Veil

Designed for those who manipulate visual reality, Veil allows you to blend and overlay images with unprecedented fluidity.

Manage up to four raster sources simultaneously in a single workspace, maintaining total control over every single pixel—and let your creativity run wild! Transition from duplication to fusion in just a few gestures, making raster manipulation an absolute breeze.

tools.description: This tool releases letters from their static role as mere text, treating them instead as malleable objects that can be redefined through playful interaction and distortion.

tools.author: T.Socche
tools.name: Waving Writing
tools.description: A kinetic typography tool raster where you can create animation in a wave like motion. You can adjust lots of parameters to personalise yuor creation. Don't forget to save a gif or a photo!

tools.author: sophiefeichter
tools.name: Musical Magic
tools.description: An interactive tool, which allows you to play and customize a guitar

tools.author: andreabinanzer
tools.name: Brush tool
tools.description: A drawing studio that lets you create art with unique textures like watercolor, calligraphy, chalk and oil paint. Watch your work come to life with the replay feature and save your creations as images or animations.

tools.author: sophiefeichter
tools.name: Motion Gif
tools.description: This tool allows you to create personal gifs with different shapes, colors, fonts and you can even regulate the speed of the gif.

tools.author: maudgrn
tools.name: tap game
tools.description: Fill the Glass! is a p5.js simulation that combines 3D interaction with voice-controlled physics. After clicking and holding to "drill" a hole in a 3D faucet model, users fill a glass by making a "shh" sound into their microphone. The tool uses Fast Fourier Transform to isolate high-frequency audio , triggering a realistic water stream that responds to the volume of your voice. This experience features dynamic WEBGL rendering, including specular lighting, spark particles, and real-time surface ripples as the glass fills.

tools.author: maudgrn
tools.name: cat gif tool
tools.description: This p5.js tool provides a modular pixel-art environment for designing an animated walking cat. Users begin by selecting a color theme before clicking interactive hitboxes on the character to open a grid-based editor. Using pixel-level brushes and transparent "ghost" guides, you can override default textures for the body, tail, or even the sky background. The final result combines your custom art with sine-wave walking physics, ready for export as a looping GIF.

tools.author: sophiefeichter
tools.name: Master Type
tools.description: This Type tool allows you to write anything in the font, the color, the style and the effect you desire.

tools.author: T.Socche
tools.name: Waving Writing
tools.description: A kinetic typography tool raster where you can create animation in a wave like motion. You can adjust lots of parameters to personalise yuor creation. Don't forget to save a gif or a photo!

tools.author: HZischg
tools.name: canvas PRO
tools.description: A professional digital canvas featuring realistic procedural brushes, dynamic paint drip physics, and symmetry tools."

tools.author: HZischg

tools.author: Julie L
tools.name: TYPE-BLAST
tools.description: Type-Blast is a Tool to transform your message into a three-dimensional piece. Use the "Explode" mode and ghost layers to capture the energy of retro-futurism.

tools.author: Julie L
tools.name: RE-PRINT
tools.description: This tool processes digital images through custom halftone and posterization engines to recreate the aesthetic of physical print media.

tools.author: castoro
tools.name: Waves
tools.description: a typing tool that converts text into three dimentional, multi-colored waves

tools.author: Julie L
tools.name: SPEED OF LIGHT
tools.description: Speed of Light is a generative art tool to create and export dynamic light-trail GIFs. The project uses a continuous central vortex to mimic the "hyperspace" effect of traveling at light speed, transforming simple brushstrokes into space.

tools.author: JulieL
tools.name: LAYER 0
tools.description: LAYER 0 is a digital canvas for experimental design and generative art. It allows you to create unique visual structures using special brushes and symmetrical reflection.

tools.author: HZischg
tools.name: 3D Motion Studio
tools.description: Deform geometric shapes into dynamic abstract animations in real-time.

tools.author: castoro
tools.name: object brush
tools.description: a digital brush tool which uses an uploaded image or an input text

tools.name: object brush
tools.description: a digital brush tool which uses an uploaded image or an input text

tools.author: HZischg
tools.name: 3D Motion Studio
tools.description: Deform geometric shapes into dynamic abstract animations in real-time.

tools.author: turbotrevi
tools.name: DotArt
tools.description: A tool that allows you to burn images through dots. You can edit dot parameters such as size, step, gamma, and colour. You can choose to upload an image from your gallery or use your camera.

tools.author: angela
tools.name: Contrast
tools.description: With this tool, you can write anything you want using special fonts. You can also use lenses to turn the text into a negative image

tools.author: Alania Alien
tools.name: Kinetic Typo
tools.description:
An interactive kinetic typography generator with neon, pulse, and distortion effects.
Type your text, adjust particle size, wave distortion, glow strength, and pulse speed, then interact locally with a mouse-controlled bubble repulsion.
Export your design as a PNG image or a seamlessly looping GIF.

tools.author: DBono
tools.name: This is not a watch
tools.description:
An object that started out as a clock and was subsequently transformed into an impossible object.
The time of day is always visible at the top, and the tool works as follows:
the object rotates in space for 30 seconds, increasing its speed more and more. At the end of the 30 seconds, the object creates “special effects”, then there is a 3-second countdown, and at the end of the countdown, a random game lasting 60 seconds begins.
At the end of the game, everything repeats itself in an infinite loop.

tools.author: DBono
tools.name: Type
tools.description: A tool that allows you to write using preset fonts with the option to save what you write as a GIF or normal photo.

tools.author: Alania Alien
tools.name: Noise Raster
tools.description:
A creative tool that converts any uploaded image into a dynamic raster grid.
Choose from multiple styles (circles, squares, scanlines, or ASCII art), adjust tile size with mouse movement, and add noise distortion for a textured look.
Customize background and ink colors, then export your design as a PNG image or a seamlessly looping GIF.

tools.author: Luca Tomaselli
tools.name: Raster
tools.description: a funny but simple raster tool

tools.author: DBono
tools.name: Raster
tools.description: A tool for editing your images to achieve a ‘Raster’ effect, with the option to choose from various editing options and freely select the image size

tools.author: DBono
tools.name: Gif
tools.description: A tool that allows you to create GIFs using preset shapes and gives you the option to use these shapes together with the ‘Brush’ or ‘Text’ options to freely draw whatever you want.

tools.author: angj
tools.name: SymmetryArt

tools.author: DBono
tools.name: Brush
tools.description: A tool for recreating the effect of a real brush, with the option of choosing the colour you draw with and the background colour. Among the various types of brushes, there is also the option of drawing with words to achieve the most personalised effect possible

tools.author: Alania Alien
tools.name: Hynosis GIF
tools.description:
An interactive generative art tool that creates hypnotic, seamless looping visuals.
Move your mouse to control distortion and spike intensity, and hold click for more chaotic motion.
Press “S” to render and download a 5-second looping GIF, with a status overlay during export.

tools.author: Luca Tomaselli

tools.author: Alania Alien
tools.name: Vortex Brush
tools.description:
An interactive generative art tool that lets you create glowing, silk-like particle drawings.
Draw with your mouse, choose from multiple color palettes, and customize effects like mirror symmetry, glow, and teleport bursts.
Save your artwork as a PNG and undo up to 10 steps.

tools.author: maudgrn
tools.name: raster studio
tools.description: Raster Studio is a p5.js image processor that converts photos into stylized halftone compositions using a multi-layer rasterization engine. It samples image brightness to map tonal density onto geometric grids, dynamically scaling shapes to recreate visual detail. By stacking layers with custom ink colors and blend modes like Multiply or Screen, users can simulate complex printmaking effects. The tool offers real-time control over grid density and opacity, ensuring high-resolution outputs that preserve original source quality.

tools.author: andreabinanzer
tools.name: magnetic raster tool
tools.description: Transform your images into interactive generative art using dynamic grids of shapes, dots, or ASCII characters. Manipulate the structure with magnetic forces in real-time and export your unique results as a PNG or animated GIF.

tools.author: emilysupremacy
tools.name: Light Gif Tool
tools.description: This tool allows you to upload a png and save a gif. Your chosen image will be searched down with a spotlight.

tools.author: sophiefeichter
tools.name: Infinite Raster
tools.description: This tool helps you create the perfect raster out of any image with many different style, color, grid and shape options and if you do not know to start you can ask the tool to surprise you

tools.author: maudgrn
tools.name: pattern studio
tools.description: Pattern Studio is a p5.js tool for creating complex mandalas and tiling textures through linked radial symmetry. By placing nodes on a grid, your brush strokes are mirrored across multiple centers and adjustable slices simultaneously. The application uses clipping masks to confine art within precise "box" boundaries, ensuring perfect alignment for repeatable patterns. Visual drafting guides and grid-snapping allow for mathematical precision before exporting the final design as a high-resolution PNG.

tools.author: emilysupremacy
tools.name: Basic Brush

tools.author: maudgrn
tools.name: type tool
tools.description: Type Tool is a p5.js environment for interactive typography that renders text inside a responsive, corner-rounding bounding box. It uses interpolation to scale individual characters based on cursor proximity or automated sine-wave pulses. The interface allows for real-time adjustments to typographic weight, spacing, and colors through a modular palette system with individual channel locks. This tool balances expressive motion design with precise layout control, supporting high-resolution PNG and GIF exports.
